column4: plus, it's footprint is a lot smaller, meaning less swap on a slower drive :)
epiphany *just works* lol
pretty good intelligent search of bookmarks and history from the location bar
yeah, non free realplayer and mozilla-mplayer work real well in epiphany
hmmm, maybe I'll try epiphany, whats the drawback?
no firefox extensions, but I can live without them
you don't need mozplugger, use mozilla-plugin, it works better for movies

it's in multiverse, but you need a working mplayer, of course :)

no mozilla-mplayer, 2.70-1ubuntu1

nope, no crash
oh well, silly firefox
annoying though
